name: Hello Golf
description:
Hello Golf ! Play with the mouse and try to control the ball.

Made for Potat0s Jam 4.

Tools:
  • Engine: Godot 3.2
  • 2D tools: piskel, Gimp, inkscape
  • Audio: LMMS

Some audio assets come from other projects.

Musics:

"Nature theme sketch" by remaxim licensed CC-BY-SA 3.0:
https://opengameart.org/content/nature-theme-sketch

"Short Theme [Rock/Metal] " by nene licensed CC0:
 https://opengameart.org/content/victory

"Victory " by celestialghost8 licensed CC0:
https://opengameart.org/content/short-theme-rockmetal
